description: This file defines a utility function `calculateWinner` for determining the winner in a tic tac toe game, given the current state of the board. It checks all winning line combinations and returns the winner and the winning line if found.

methods.name: calculateWinner(squares)
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner in the current tic tac toe board state and returns the winner ('X' or 'O') along with the winning line indices.
